definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)

sentences.english: Lay your feet on the floor outside your left hip, with the left ankle resting in the right arch.
sentences.chinese: 把腳放你左臀部的地板外側，左腳踝在右腳足弓處。

sentences.english: The bigger the "C" in the footprint, the higher your arch.
sentences.chinese: 腳印上的“C”越大，足弓就越高。

sentences.english: Aim To analyse the biomechanical mechanism of arcus plantaris and its clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析足弓的生物力學原理及在臨牀的應用。

sentences.english: Moisture-wicking suede footbed with arch support and cupped heel.
sentences.chinese: 排汗絨面鞋墊足弓支撐和巨腳跟。

sentences.english: Foot arch includes medial, lateral longitudinal arch and transverse arch.
sentences.chinese: 足弓包括內外側縱弓和中前足的橫弓。

sentences.english: Ultra padded footbed provides all-day cushioned comfort and arch support to your delicate feet.
sentences.chinese: 超填充鞋墊提供全天軟墊舒適你嬌嫩的腳，足弓支撐。

sentences.english: This flattens the arch and makes it drop.
sentences.chinese: 這會使足弓變平且脆弱。

sentences.english: Steel shank provides increased midfoot support and lateral stability.
sentences.chinese: 鋼柄增加足弓的支持和側向穩定性。

sentences.english: They also need a shoe with extra cushioning to compensate for their high arches.
sentences.chinese: 他們還需要鞋提供額外緩衝來適應他們的高足弓。

sentences.english: Cupped midfoot for maximum balance and performance.
sentences.chinese: 捧着足弓最大的平衡和性能。

sentences.english: Lift the inner ankles to strengthen the inner arches.
sentences.chinese: 上提腳踝內側加強內側足弓。

sentences.english: When picking a new pair of walking shoes, be sure to consider your arch type.
sentences.chinese: 在買新的健步鞋時，一定要考慮自己的足弓。

sentences.english: ELITE insole with dual density EVA for superior Longitudinal and Transverse Arch Support.
sentences.chinese: 精英鞋墊雙密度EVA優越的縱向和橫向的足弓支撐。

sentences.english: Over time, your arches tend to fall and your feet become longer.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的流逝，你的足弓在往下落，腳變長。

sentences.english: More durable arch supports can be custom-made from a plaster cast of your foot.
sentences.chinese: 如有必要，可以根據腳模定製持久耐用的足弓支撐。

sentences.english: Make sure the shoes are not too tight across the arch and that your heel is snug.
sentences.chinese: 確保在足弓處鞋子不要太緊，腳後跟要緊貼鞋子。
